mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ssq (code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content,lottery_date,create_time) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{b1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{b2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{poolmoney,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lotteryDate,jdbcType=DATE},now())
mapper.update: update ssq set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r1 = #{r1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r2 = #{r2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r3 = #{r3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r4 = #{r4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r5 = #{r5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r6 = #{r6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b1 = #{b1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b2 = #{b2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=BIGINT}, poolmoney = #{poolmoney,jdbcType=BIGINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lottery_date = #{lotteryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content, lottery_date,create_time,update_time from ssq where code < '20060' order by code desc
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ssq (code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content, lottery_date,create_time) values
(#{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.r1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.r2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.r3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.r4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.r5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.r6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.b1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.b2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sales,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.poolmoney,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lotteryDate,jdbcType=DATE},now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from ssq where r1=#{0} or r2=#{0} or r3=#{0} or r4=#{0} or r5=#{0} or r6=#{0}
select count(*) from ssq where b1=#{0}
select b1 ball,COUNT(*) cnt from ssq group by b1
select count(*) from ssq where r1=#{r1} and r2=#{r2} and r3=#{r3} and r4=#{r4} and r5=#{r5} and r6=#{r6}
select id, code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content,lottery_date,create_time,update_time from ssq order by code desc limit #{0}
select count(*) from ssq where code = #{code}
